name: IBM Cloud Private HA installation on Microsoft Azure
description: This template will deploy ICP with load balancers and boot node.

metadata.displayName: IBM Cloud Private HA installation on Microsoft Azure
metadata.longDescription: This template will deploy ICP with load balancers and boot node.

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
Virtual Machines (10 or more VMs)
Virtual Machine 1 : IBM Cloud Private Boot Node
Virtual Machine 2/3/4 : IBM Cloud Private Master Nodes
Virtual Machine 5/6/7 : IBM Cloud Private Proxy Nodes
Virtual Machine 8/9/10 : IBM Cloud Private Worker Nodes
Virtual Machine 11/12/13 (optional) : IBM Cloud Private Vulnerability Node
Virtual Machine 14/15/16 (optional) : IBM Cloud Private Management Node

bullets.title: Default Virtual Machine Settings
bullets.description: Defaults are shown and can be changed on deploy. They differ depending on the vm role.

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. IBM Knowledge Center for IBM Cloud Private - https://www.ibm.com/support/knowledgecenter/en/SSBS6K/product_welcome_cloud_private.html
3. IBM Support Portal - https://www.ibm.com/support/home/
